title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct market research and gather user feedback to understand sustainability needs and preferences.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the data pipeline, recommendation engine, user interface components, and data storage. Consider scalability, maintainability, and performance optimizations. Address potential security concerns and data privacy measures. Outline the integration points between different components and the communication protocols.

title: Data Collection and Processing
description: Identify and integrate data sources for product sustainability information. Develop data extraction, cleaning, and normalization processes.

title: Sustainability Scoring Algorithm
description: Develop an algorithm to calculate sustainability scores for products based on various factors (e.g., materials, manufacturing processes, carbon footprint).

title: Recommendation Engine
description: Implement a recommendation engine to suggest eco-friendly alternatives based on user preferences and product sustainability scores.

title: User Interface Development
description: Design and develop a user-friendly interface for users to search for products, view sustainability scores, and receive eco-friendly recommendations.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement a database schema to store product information, sustainability data, and user preferences.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and ensure compliance with privacy regulations.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop test plans and execute comprehensive testing (unit, integration, and end-to-end) to ensure the application's functionality, performance, and reliability.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment environment, configure continuous integration and delivery pipelines, and implement monitoring and logging systems.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for developers, administrators, and end-users. Establish user support channels and processes.
